attributes.action: allow Sir Ian Blair, the Honourable Commissioner of Police to stay in Office to continue his duties as the Head of the Police.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
While accepting the short comings of the police during the ill-fated incident at Stockwell and whilst, I commiserate with the families of Charles De Menezes. I am of the opinion that Sir Ian Blair should be left alone to do his job. Under the CIRCUMSTANCES the police were acting in the interest of the public. It was a difficult situation. Mistakes were made. I disagree with the way the public,politicians and most particularly the PRESS (indirectly) are clamouring for Sir Ian’s resignation. I believe, we, as human beings are allowed to make mistakes; Sir Ian has made a few, but in very difficult circumstances.  Can you remember the incident where two suspiciously looking Asian men were thrown off the plane? Now let’s imagine that the “members of the public” were police officers. That means two innocent men might have lost there lives on that day, RIGHT. Well, let’s look inwards and give the man a chance. The UK has one of the best forces in the world (even though I’m not their biggest fan), but on this occasion I believe I’m standing on the right side.
UK, don’t always show that you like to bring people down. Let’s lift people up for a change.
GIVE SIR IAN BLAIR A CHANCE.
